lead_paragraph: Daniel Ricciardo expects to be the center of attention at the Russian Grand Prix on Friday, if only fleetingly, when he tries out a new 'aeroscreen' head protection device fitted to the cockpit of his Red Bull Formula One car.

headline.print_headline: Ricciardo to Test 'Aeroscreen' in Sochi F1 Practice
headline.main: Ricciardo to Test 'Aeroscreen' in Sochi F1 Practice

snippet: Daniel Ricciardo expects to be the center of attention at the Russian Grand Prix on Friday, if only fleetingly, when he tries out a new 'aeroscreen' head protection device fitted to the cockpit of his Red Bull Formula One car....
